cast.overview: Copenhagen, 2018. A frightening discovery is made in an old apartment. The subsequent investigation of Department Q leads them to an infamous institution for girls that was suddenly closed in the early sixties.
cast.title: The Purity of Vengeance

crew.overview: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town, she learns that their support has a price.
crew.title: Dogville

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Anders Hove (born 16 January 1956) is a Greenlandic actor and director. Hove is best known for his role of the vampire Radu Vladislas in the four Subspecies-movies, Cesar Faison in ABC's General Hospital, Loving, & Port Charles and in the film In the Middle of the Night as Nalle.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Anders Hove (actor), licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Anders Hove
